subject: Golf
organizations: Buick Division of General Motors Corp
lead_paragraph: General Motors and Tiger Woods ended their nearly decade-long endorsement deal one year early as the automaker looks to cut costs and the golfer plans to spend more time with his growing family.
snippet: General Motors and Tiger Woods ended their nearly decade-long endorsement deal one year early as the automaker looks to cut costs and the golfer plans to spend more time with his growing family.
